    • updateOrderStatus

      public void updateOrderStatus(String orderNumber, String orderStatus) throws EntityNotFoundException, IllegalStateException
      Description copied from interface: RestaurantOrderService

      Specified by:
      updateOrderStatus in interface RestaurantOrderService
      Parameters:
      orderNumber - the number which uniquely identifies the order
      orderStatus - the new status of the order
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no order was found with the given order number.
